name: Stelfy Coon
description:
You are Ra-Kun, a sneaky ninja from the notorious Coon-Clan. Use the nebulous Smokebomb technique and steal the golden banana from the pesky Chimps!

CONTROLS:

  • W,A,S,D to move
  • SPACE or F to throw smokebomb

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Find the golden banana and bring it back to the entry point.
  • Evade the patrolling Chimps and don't let them slap you.
  • Use Smokebombs in dangerous situations.

CREDITS:

  • Albert: Coding
  • Philip: Coding
  • Regina: Level Art
  • Van An: Character Art & Animations
  • Vlad: Sound & Leveldesign
